title: Neil & Martin's Bon Voyage
overview: Neil Morrissey and Martin Clunes are to reunite for factual entertainment series Neil & Martin's Bon Voyage(3x60') produced by Expectation for Gold, the nation's favourite comedy channel.Having famously starred together as flatmates Tony and Gary in Men Behaving Badly, in this new series Neil Morrissey will take Martin Clunes on a road trip through France, the country that has become his second home. From Normandy, through the Alps and to Neil's home and cider apple orchard in the South, and taking in beautiful food, sweeping landscapes and fascinating local traditions, the two friends will reconnect and reminisce on a professional and personal relationship that spans thirty years.
